item.title: Automate Sending Out Feedback Using Power Automate Desktop
item.description: If you didn’t know, I spent the first 10 years of my career as a public middle school teacher. It was a dark time, but one of the brightest lights of that time was my best friend Emily, who I met halfway through my stint as a teacher. She’s still teaching, and today on the phone she said, “Hey, so I was playing around in Word today and I saw a button that said Power Automate… that’s what you do, right?
